longDescription: Cheek augmentation is about more than volume—it’s the anchor of facial harmony. We map your cheekbones, assess fat pad descent, and select HA or collagen-stimulating fillers that rebuild structure without heaviness. Expect lifted lower face, brighter under-eyes, and a naturally contoured profile.
tagline: Lift, Sculpt, and Illuminate the Mid-Face

title: Cheek Augmentation

cta.title: Ready to Lift Without Surgery?
cta.subtitle: Book a cheek contour consultation today.

overview.content: We layer filler deep onto the cheekbone for lift, then refine the apple for soft fullness. Micro-cannulas ensure even distribution and reduce bruising. For structure seekers we use firmer fillers; for glow chasers, softer blends that catch the light.
highlights: Balances nasolabial folds and under-eye shadows
Customised for feminine, masculine, or androgynous goals
Option to pair with skin boosters or tear trough filler
overview.title: Our Contouring Method

candidacy.title: Who Benefits?
candidacy.note: We dissolve old filler before rebuilding if migration is present.

seo.metaDescription: Achieve sculpted, lifted cheeks with doctor-led cheek filler treatments. Premium products, cannula technique, zero overfilling.
seo.metaTitle: Cheek Fillers London | Mid-Face Contouring | Dr. SNA Clinic

schema.howPerformed: After applying numbing cream, a flexible micro-cannula (blunt-tipped tube) is gently inserted through a tiny entry point near your ear. Smooth hyaluronic acid gel is carefully layered deep onto your cheekbone to create lift, then refined near the surface for soft fullness. The cannula glides smoothly—no multiple needle pricks. We check your face from every angle, comparing symmetry in the mirror with you. The result is sculpted, lifted cheeks that catch light beautifully
schema.preparation: Arrive with clean, makeup-free skin. Stop blood-thinning supplements (fish oil, vitamin E, aspirin) one week before. Avoid alcohol 48 hours prior. Eat a proper meal beforehand—low blood sugar increases bruising risk. Bring inspiration photos showing cheek shapes you love. We'll map your face and design volume placement just for you
schema.followup: Apply ice packs for 20 minutes every few hours for the first day. Sleep elevated for two nights. Avoid intense workouts, saunas, and face-down positions for 48 hours. No facial massage for one week. Makeup can be worn after 24 hours. Attend your 2-week review where we'll assess settling and add tiny refinements if needed (included)
schema.outcome: Immediately lifted, more youthful mid-face. Your eyes appear brighter as shadows disappear. Smile lines soften naturally. The lower face looks more supported and elegant. Filler settles beautifully over 2 weeks, moving naturally when you smile or talk. Results last 12-18 months. You look like the best version of yourself—not 'done'
schema.medicationRequired: Topical numbing cream. Optional dental nerve block for extra comfort in sensitive patients
schema.treatmentFrequency: Single session with optional 2-week refinement. Most patients maintain results with yearly touch-ups as cheeks metabolize filler slowly due to deep placement
schema.adverseOutcome: Mild swelling for 24-48 hours (ice helps). Small bruise at entry point possible. Temporary firmness that softens within days. Very rarely, visible lumpiness if too much product used in one area (we use conservative, layered technique)
contraindication: Active skin infection or cold sore
Severe allergies to hyaluronic acid (extremely rare)
typicalTest: Photos from multiple angles (front, profile, three-quarters)
Bone structure and fat pad assessment
Discussion of aesthetic goals and facial balance
clinicalFindings: Descended fat pads creating tired appearance

description: Strategic cheek filler restores youthful lift, balances facial proportions, and highlights your best angles.

hero.subheadline: Doctor-only cheek augmentation that restores youthful contour and radiance.
hero.headline: Instant Lift. Lasting Confidence.

faq.question: Will it look fake?
faq.answer: No. We sculpt with your natural bone structure in mind, using conservative volumes. Dr Abbas follows a 'less is more' philosophy—you'll look refreshed, never overdone.

faq.question: Does it move when I smile?
faq.answer: We place filler deep and secure, so it moves like your own tissue. You can laugh, smile, and make expressions naturally.

faq.question: How long do cheek fillers last?
faq.answer: Cheek fillers typically last 12-18 months. Because we place filler deep onto the bone where there's less movement, longevity is excellent. Touch-ups are usually only needed yearly.

faq.question: Does cheek filler hurt?
faq.answer: We apply topical numbing cream and can add a dental nerve block for extra comfort. Most patients describe mild pressure rather than pain. The cannula technique we use is gentler than multiple needle pricks.

faq.question: How much does cheek augmentation cost in London?
faq.answer: Our Subtle Lift (1ml) is £395. The Signature Contour (2ml + tear trough touch-up) is £695 (save £95). Consultation fee (£75) is credited toward treatment. 0% finance available.

faq.question: Will I bruise from cheek filler?
faq.answer: Bruising is minimal with our cannula technique—only one entry point versus multiple needle pricks. If bruising occurs, it's typically small and easily covered with makeup after 24 hours.

faq.question: How much filler do I need for cheeks?
faq.answer: Most patients achieve beautiful results with 1-2ml (0.5-1ml per side). First-timers often start with 1ml for subtle lift, then add more at review if desired. We never overfill on first session.

faq.question: Can cheek filler be dissolved if I don't like it?
faq.answer: Yes, hyaluronic acid cheek fillers can be dissolved with hyaluronidase enzyme if needed. However, this is rarely necessary when treatment is done conservatively by experienced injectors.
